import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import Sheet from 'react-modal-sheet'; import "./styles.css"; import { Button, Container, Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardHeader, FormGroup, Input, Label, Form, CardFooter } from "reactstrap"; const ViewPreviousBidsListHelper = ({ bidsPane, openBidListPane }) => { return ( openBidListPane(false)}>

View 'Bid History' & all previously submitted bid related data for this specific auction

These are the previous bids (all bids) that have been recieved for this specific listing. You will be able to see the bidder's name, date posted and the bid amount however we limit all other information/data.

Place a bid
{"You'll need to enter a bid that is HIGHER than the existing bid otherwise it'll be rejected automatically. Please enter a bid HIGHER than the exsting current bid amount.."}
); } export default ViewPreviousBidsListHelper;
